Welcome to CoCoTools!¶

CoCoTools is a library that provides utilities for users to gather, process and register macaque neuroanatomical data stored on the CoCoTools database. Using only high-level commands, users of CoCoTools can query, process and register the wealth of CoCoMac data to create customized matrices (graphs) depicting the macro-connections of the macaque brain
